title: Resident Evil 7 E3 2016 Trailer - Kinda Funny Reacts
description:
Subscribe for all your E3 2016 updates! https://www.youtube.com/c/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Colin and Tim breakdown the Resident Evil 7 E3 2016 Trailer!

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Colin - http://www.twitter.com/NoTaxation
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino

transcript_chunks.text: E3 2016 is happening kind of funny is going all out with Let's Plays and reaction videos all week long subscribe now at youtube.com/ kind of funny games to not miss a thing what's up guys I'm Tim Gettys this is Colin Mor Ari and right over here we got Resident Evil 7 biohazard awesome and in Japan biohazard colon Resident Evil that's awesome man out of left field yeah I so there was a long rumors we I had predicted that resid Evil 7 would be at the show and come out this fall it's going to come out a little later it's going to come out in January Capcom needs a little bit more time the cool thing about this is twofold uh Playstation prr compatible from front to back which is [ __ ] amazing that's completely amazing this might be really the first true AAA fleshed out campaign that we have going to play in VR I I don't know of any other games that are going to be that are of this you know level um that are going to be fully playable I mean we have great looking games but they're not

going to play in VR I I don't know of any other games that are going to be that are of this you know level um that are going to be fully playable I mean we have great looking games but they're not campaign based I mean this is going to be maybe a 12 or 15 hour game probably the cooler thing is that that kitchen demo that's been floating around for a long time has been an Easter egg and no one and no one had realized it similar to PT with Silent Hills that Konami did so or yeah Konami did so what you you pointed this out to me earlier that in the the kitchen logo there's actually the VII like oh Greg I not want to take credit for that Greg pointed that out yeah that's that's awesome like that's super cool that kitchen demo was one of one of my favorite VR experiences I've ever done so far so I'm I'm really excited that's actually a Resident Evil like that's super super cool um I I'm also really excited I was talking this on PS I love you that that is called Resident Evil 7 um because I
